document.heading: Homeless Services Reform Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-129, the “Homeless Services Reform Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-679. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 8, 2014, and May 6, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 2, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-346 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-129 became effective on July 23, 2014.
